references: A. Brousseau, Fibonacci and Related Number Theoretic Tables. Fibonacci Association, San Jose, CA, 1972, p. 113.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: V. C. Harris, C. C. Styles, A generalization of Fibonacci numbers, Fib. Quart. 2 (1964) 277-289, sequence u(n,1,3).
Vedran Krcadinac, A new generalization of the golden ratio, Fibonacci Quart. 44 (2006), no. 4, 335-340.
Simon Plouffe, Approximations de séries génératrices et quelques conjectures, Dissertation, Université du Québec à Montréal, 1992.
Simon Plouffe, 1031 Generating Functions and Conjectures, Université du Québec à Montréal, 1992.
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3, -3, 1, 1).
maple: A003522:=-(z-1)**2/(-1+3*z-3*z**2+z**4+z**3); # conjectured by _Simon Plouffe_ in his 1992 dissertation
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
